title: GOAT India Tour: Gavaskar slams Messi for Kolkata ruckus - 'Failed to honour commitment'

Gavaskar suggests that if Messi's team failed to honour agreed-upon activities, they, not local mismanagement, were the primary culprits. He urges checking commitments on both sides before assigning blame.

description: India's job market is rapidly evolving by 2026, prioritizing skills and digital fluency over tenure. Technology-led roles in data science, AI, and cloud computing are booming, alongside growth in green infrastructure, quick commerce, and precision manufacturing. High paychecks are increasingly linked to specialized digital capabilities and niche technical certifications.

title: Ex-Sabres GM Kevyn Adams leaks confidential contract negotiation details
description: Former Buffalo Sabres general manager Kevyn Adams has sparked fresh NHL controversy. Especially after publicly discussing confidential contract negotiations. That involves forward Alex Tuch. The unexpected disclosure has raised questions around ethics. And player leverage, and Buffalo’s long-term strategy. Mostly, as the franchise approaches a critical trade deadline amid continued playoff struggles.

The party faces persistent issues like infighting, disillusioned cadres, and senior leaders departing, raising questions about its ability to reform and regain relevance.

title: Juice cleanses, fasting don’t work: 5 habits that truly detox liver & gut
description: Forget quick fixes; true liver and gut detox hinges on sustainable lifestyle choices. Experts highlight that excess sugars, refined carbs and sedentary habits stress these vital organs. Embracing a balanced diet, consistent physical activity and a healthy gut microbiome are key. Managing underlying metabolic diseases and considering personalised genomic insights further bolster the body's natural cleansing power for long-term well-being.

title: Quote of the day by Michael Jordan: 'My attitude is that if you push me…'
description: Michael Jordan, a basketball legend, transformed perceived weaknesses into strengths, a philosophy exemplified by his journey from being cut from his high school team to winning six NBA championships. His resilience and determination, fueled by adversity, serve as a powerful reminder that success often begins when self-doubt ends, inspiring many to embrace challenges.

title: Braun Strowman & Raquel Rodriguez net worth 2025: WWE earnings, lifestyle
description: Braun Strowman and Raquel Rodriguez showcase contrasting WWE financial journeys in 2025. Strowman, a former headliner, boasts an estimated net worth of $2-5 million, built on lucrative deals and merchandise. Rodriguez, a rising star, has a projected $700,000, with her value steadily increasing through television exposure and championship opportunities.

title: How police secretly tracked missing coach Travis Turner before abuse charges
description: Experts believe fugitive football coach Travis Turner was likely caught through a secret police sting or flagged online activity. Authorities say Turner faces 10 child pornography-related charges. While police remain silent, criminologists told the Daily Mail that undercover officers, tech company reports, or device searches likely led to the case.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
description: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5% of its Luxembourg workforce, impacting software developers as the company embraces AI. This reduction follows a global layoff of 14,000 employees and comes after negotiations resulted in a reduced number from the initial plan. Despite the cuts, Amazon reaffirms Luxembourg as a strategic European partner.
